meanings: break, smash, (파괴하다) destroy, demolish, pull down, tear down

vlive.korean: 다 부술거야? Are you going to break everything? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 비가 오는 날에는 ☔️☔️
vlive.english: Are you going to break everything?

vlive.korean: [이와중에 손가락도 귀엽기 있냐고요... 더는 부술 아파트가 없다고요 저는...] [Even your fingers are cute.] View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 🎨역시!! 무대미술과!! 그림으로 말하는 게 거의 웅변대회 대상급!!🏆 (DAEHWI’s drawing quiz)

[티격] - 괜찮아 환희가 해 - 넌 다 부술 것 같은데? [Tit for tat] - It's okay. Let Hwanhee do that. - You're going to break them. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [UP10TION] 🏠허니하우스 입주민 모집합니다! 외풍&누수 주의하세요💛 (RASAMONG making a cookie house)
vlive.english: [Tit for tat] - It's okay. Let Hwanhee do that. - You're going to break them.

vlive.korean: 이번에 진짜 부숴버릴 거예요 - 그래서 오늘 어디 부술 거예요? I'll make sure to rock it this time. - So what are you going to rock today? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]SINGING ROOM X PENTAGON - 코인노래방 X 펜타곤
vlive.english: I'll make sure to rock it this time. - So what are you going to rock today?

vlive.korean: 근데 아파트를 왜 부수지? - 아파트를 부술 정도로 좋다는... Why do they want to break down an apartment building? - He likes her so much that he wants to break it down. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]인서울 가이드 (IN SEOUL-GUIDE)
vlive.english: Why do they want to break down an apartment building? - He likes her so much that he wants to break it down.

examples.korean: Winds and waves can smash boats. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바람과 파도는 배들을 부술 수 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: These beaks are quite strong, and easily break through the hard shells of seeds consumed by the birds. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 부리는 매우 튼튼해 새가 먹는 단단한 씨의 껍질을 부술 수 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These beaks are quite strong, and easily break through the hard shells of seeds consumed by the birds. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had broad faces, heavy jaws, and massive crushing and grinding teeth that were used for eating hard fruits, seeds, and fibrous underground plant parts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이들은 얼굴이 크고, 턱이 강했으며, 음식물을 으깨고, 잘게 부술 수 있는 큰 이가 있어, 딱딱한 과일, 씨앗, 땅 속에 묻혀 있는 섬유질 많은 식물의 일부를 씹어 먹을 수 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: They had broad faces, heavy jaws, and massive crushing and grinding teeth that were used for eating hard fruits, seeds, and fibrous underground plant parts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had strong teeth capable of crushing the bones of their prey, although they were unable to move quickly and so sometimes resorted to scavenging for food. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 티라노사우루스는 재빨리 움직일 수 없어서 가끔은 썩은 고기를 찾는 것에 의존했지만, 먹이의 뼈를 부술 수 있는 강한 이빨을 갖고 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: They had strong teeth capable of crushing the bones of their prey, although they were unable to move quickly and so sometimes resorted to scavenging for food. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Battering rams could easily destroy doors or walls of castles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공성망치는 쉽게 성문이나 성벽을 부술 수 있었다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: Battering rams could easily destroy doors or walls of castles. Add to Wordbook
